entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 11:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: N 15 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
